text: Kanci–Pejagan toll road is a toll road connected Cirebon and Brebes in Java, Indonesia. The toll road is also included in Indonesian National Route 1 and Trans-Java toll road. The toll road was opened on 26 January 2010. The toll road was operated by Bakrie Toll Road. The length of this toll road is about 36 kilometres. In 2013, the toll is acquired by MNC Land and now operated by Waskita Toll Road. ==Exits== {|class="wikitable ! KM !! Toll Gate !! Destination||Status |- |252||Ciledug||Ciledug, Losari||Open |- |266||Pejagan||Pejagan, Prupuk, Purwokerto||Open |- |} ==Emergency toll road== Due to traffic during holidays, the emergency toll road, Pejagan–Pemalang Toll Road will be opened. ==References== Category:Toll roads in Indonesia Category:Transport in West Java Category:Cirebon Category:Cirebon Regency Category:Transport in Central Java
title: Kanci–Pejagan Toll Road
